author: iSazonov
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

After merging #12288 we get CommandLine property on Windows and Linux but not on MacOs.

# Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

From @powercode 
The APIs will probably require some native coding on the mac.

We can probably use the same apis as top.

https://opensource.apple.com/source/top/top-111.20.1/libtop.c.auto.html
title: Add CommandLine property to Process object on MacOs
